name: Nachos
description: These amazing nachos aren’t just tasty, they're packed with protein and the rich seasonings make it have a kick that will leave you addicted and yearning for more!

ingredients.title: Nachos
ingredients: 16 ounces (2 cups) refried beans, canned or homemade
4 ounces cheddar cheese, grated (about 2 cups), plus more for topping
4 ounces Colby Jack cheese, grated (about 2 cups), plus more for topping
1 cup pico de gallo, store-bought or homemade, plus more for topping

subList: Combine all spices in a bowl.

instructions.mainList: Make the beef and bean topping:
subList: Add ground beef and stir until brown.
Return meat to pan and add beans/water.
Set heat to low while making chips.
Place tortilla chips on sheet pan.
Toast chips at 350 degrees F, for 5 minutes.
Top off tortilla chips with half the cheese.
Top off with beef and beans.
